Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 151 of 262 1862
LC8Cmax5 Rodgers - direct
1 A. Luton, England, to Bangor, Maine.
2 Q. Is Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight?
3 A. Yes.
4 Q. Is Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight?
5 A. Yes.
6 Q. Is Virginia Roberts a passenger on this flight?
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. And is there one other passenger?
9 A. Yes.
10 Q. Let's go to the very next flight on this page, please.
11 A. That's March the 11th, 2001.
12 Q. Where are you flying from and to?
13 A. Bangor, Maine, to Teterboro, New Jersey.
14 Q. Is Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight?
15 A. Yes.
16 Q. Is Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight?
17 A. Yes.
18 Q. Is Virginia Roberts a passenger on this flight?
19 A. Yes.
20 Q. And is there one other passenger on this flight?
21 A. Yes.
22 Q. Before we leave this page, up at entry 1466, the March 8th, 2001, is there an entry for one female?
23 2001, is there an entry for one female?
24 A. Yes.
25 Q. What does that mean?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00019013
